name: Summon Steward
description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

name: Purify Soul
description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

name: Soulshape
description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

name: Flicker
description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

name: Fleshcraft
description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

name: Door of Shadows
description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

name: Spear of Bastion
description:
Throw a Kyrian spear at the target location, dealing (200% of Attack power) Arcane damage instantly and an additional (216% of Attack power) damage over 4 sec. 

Enemies hit are tethered to Spear of Bastion's location for the duration.

<dynamic>Generates 25 Rage.</dynamic>

name: Ancient Aftershock
description:
Unleash a wave of anima, dealing (220% of Attack power) Nature damage to up to 5 enemies and knocking them down for 1.5 sec.

Enemies struck take (42% of Attack power) Nature damage every 2 sec for 12 sec and transfer it to you as 6 Rage.

name: Conqueror's Banner
description:
Brandish the banner of the Necrolords for 2 min, increasing your movement speed by 10% and causing 

<spec>Arms</spec>
<dynamic>Mortal Strike</dynamic>

<spec>Fury</spec>
<dynamic>Raging Blow</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Shield Slam</dynamic>


<dynamic>one of your abilities</dynamic>

 to grant you <dynamic>Glory</dynamic>. Killing an enemy grants 2 stacks of <dynamic>Glory</dynamic>.

Reactivating this ability plants the banner in the ground, granting 20% maximum health and 50% attack speed to you and 4 allies within 15 yds of the banner. Lasts 2 sec per <dynamic>Glory</dynamic>, up to 30 sec.

name: Condemn
description:
Condemn a foe to suffer for their sins, causing up to [2.0 * (92.2% of Attack power)] Shadow damage. Only usable on enemies who are above 80% health or below 20% health.

The primary target is weakened, preventing up to [(0.6 * Attack power) * 2.0 * (1 + Versatility)] damage they would deal to you.

<spec>Arms</spec><spec>Protection (Level 18)</spec>
<dynamic>If your foe survives, 20% of the Rage spent is refunded</dynamic>
